Dashboard_Banner_Head: Empowering Health, One Pill at a Time!
Dashboard_Banner_Body: Revolutionizing healthcare with intelligent pillboxes powered by IoT technology.
Dashboard_Config_Body: Customize your pillbox's settings to meet the specific needs of your patients and healthcare providers.
Dashboard_Explore_Body: Find detailed guides, tutorials, and API documentation to help you integrate our IoT pillbox solutions seamlessly into your healthcare system.
Doc_Home_Body: Welcome to the Pillbox documentation. Here you will find everything you need to know about our IoT pillbox solutions.
Doc_HowTo_Body: Learn how to set up and configure your pillbox, and how to use its features to manage your medication.
Doc_Messages_Body: Welcome to the Pillbox documentation. Here you will find everything you need to know about our IoT pillbox solutions.
